sentence.Network_en: Communication of whatever sort involves not just a speaker but a hearer too.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何一种交流都不仅要有说话者，还要有听者。

sentence.Network_en: Stay to the hearer of is an enjoy of fantasy sort.
sentence.Network_cn: 留给听者的是梦幻般的享受.

sentence.Network_en: To assist the presiding hearer in organizing the hearing.
sentence.Network_cn: 协助听证主持人组织听证.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... hear 听见 hearer 听众 hearing 听力.
以h开头的英语英文单词 ... heard 的过去式(分词)；听 hearer 听者,听众 hearken 倾听.
道歉言语行为通常发生在当说话者（Speaker）有意或无意中冒犯了听话者（Hearer）时而采取的一种旨在恢复两者之间以往特定关系 …
2010高考英语词汇完型单选秘诀 ... hear from 收到...来信 hearer 听的人，旁听者 blood through your body 心脏.

list.abs: she continued her story undisturbed by the merry sallies of her hearers .她继续她的故事而不受她的听众的欢乐俏皮话所打扰。
网络释义hearer 听众; 旁听人; 听者; shee hearer 剪羊毛机; auditor hearer 听者; Sound-Hearer 声闻; audience hearer listener listenership 听众.
May God enable every worshipper to be hearer and doer of Word !, 求主帮助每位聚会者 , 都能成为一个听道并行道的人!

he spoke with fire and conviction , mincing no words in his attack upon the slaves and their morality and tactics and frankly alluding to his hearers as the slaves in question .他感情炽烈，信心十足，他攻击奴隶们和他们的策略和道德观念，而且直言不讳，坦率地向听众们暗示他们就是那些奴隶。

entry.def: Your hearers are the people who are listening to you speak.

example.ex: He knew that his hearers wanted to hear this story...
example.tran: 他知道自己的听众想听这个故事。

example.ex: Communication of whatever sort involves not just a speaker but a hearer too.
example.tran: 任何一种交流都不仅要有说话者，还要有听者。

auth_sentence.content: The other agent, the hearer, then has to guess which item, and thus color, the speaker referred to.
